newsitem.title: VENEZUELA: Ten killed, 22 injured in Venezuela bus accident.
newsitem.headline: Ten killed, 22 injured in Venezuela bus accident.

text.p: At least 10 people, three of them children, were killed and 22 injured when a bus plunged into a river in central Caracas on Tuesday, a fire brigade spokesman said.
A doctor at the scene of the accident said four of the injured were in critical condition.

The bus, carrying about 45 passengers, was on its way from Caracas to the Valles del Tuy area, about 25 miles (40 km) to the south when it skidded and plunged into the polluted waters of the Guaire river..
